actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to revise the pay structure and retirement and disability benefits of policemen and firemen at Washington National Airport and Dulles International Airport.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Transportation to fix the per annum rates of basic pay of positions on the police force and the fire department of Washington National Airport and Dulles International Airport in accordance with the rates of basic compensation, including longevity increases provided in the District of Columbia Police and Firemen's Salary Act for officers and members of the Metropolitan Police force and the Fire Department of the District of Columbia in corresponding or similar positions. Requires the Secretary to take such action as may be necessary to permit any such officer or member of the police or fire department to elect the benefits provided officers and members of the Metropolitan Police force and of the Fire Department of the District of Columbia.

titles.title: A bill to revise the pay structure and retirement and disability benefits of policemen and firemen at Washington National Airport and Dulles International Airport.
